UNIVERSITY OF ILLINSIS
September 2$, 19$2
Hr. J. Arthur Dupont
General Manager
Station CJAD
1191 Mountain Street
Montreal, Quo., Canada
Dear ?*r. Dupont j
Tour letter of Saptenber 17 addressed to Mr. Frank Schooley has been
referred to me.
I am sorry that I cannot give you further details on the programs about
which you asked. Some of these have been produced. Others are in
production. Otters are in the pilot program stage. The exact release
dates on none have been set. Undoubtedly they will not be released
until after the elections here in the United States. If you would care
to write m again about November 10, I believe I could give you a definite
answer.
Sincerely,
JS@c*ipFrank Schooley
Jim Miles
Executive Director
